to_str: Bool -> String
g(b) = if b { "T" } else { "F" }

is_large: Int -> Bool
h x = x > 100

HInt to_str :: (Int -> Bool) -> (Int -> String)

HInt to_str is_large x
== (fun Ïƒ -> Ïƒ |> to_str) is_large x
== (is_large |> to_str) x
== to_str (x > 100)
== if x > 100 {"T"} else { "F" }

fmap<F> : (X -> Y) -> (F X -> F Y) 

to_str : Int -> String

fmap<List> to_str |> head<String> :: List<Int> -> Option<String>

(fmap<List> to_str |> head<String>) [1, 2]
== head<Int> (["1", "2"])
== Some("1")

head<Int> | fmap<Option> to_str :: List<Int> -> Option<String>

(head<Int> | fmap<Option> to_str) [1, 2]
== (fmap<Option> to_str)(Some(1))
== Some("1")

contramap : (X -> Y) -> (F Y -> F X)

A = Int ã¨ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
F ã‚’åå¤‰é–¢æ‰‹ã¨ã—ã€contramapãŒã‚ã‚‹ã€‚

y : (forall X. (X -> Int) -> F X) -> F Int
y(Ïƒ) = Ïƒ<Int>(id<Int>)
y_: F Int -> (forall X. (X -> Int) -> F X)
y(a) = fun Ïƒ -> contramap<F>(Ïƒ)(a)

F = * -> Stringã¨ã™ã‚‹ã¨
y : (forall X. (X -> Int) -> (X -> String) -> Int -> String
y(Ïƒ) = Ïƒ<Int>(id<Int>)
y_: (Int -> String) -> (forall X. (X -> Int) -> (X -> String)
y_(f) = fun Ïƒ -> contramap<* -> String>(Ïƒ)(f)

contramap<* -> Sring>: (X -> Y) -> (Y -> String) -> (X -> String)
contramap(Ïƒ)(f) = Ïƒ |> f
y_(f) = fun Ïƒ -> Ïƒ |> f
å…·ä½“çš„ã«to_str: Intâ†’Stringã‚’ä¸ãˆã‚‹ã¨ã€(X â†’ Int) â†’ (X â†’ String)ã«å¤‰æ›ã§ãã‚‹ã€‚

to_str: Int -> String
y_(to_str) : (X -> Int) -> (X -> String)
y_(to_str) == fun Ïƒ -> Ïƒ |> to_str

map_to_str: (X -> Int) -> (X -> String)
map_to_str(Ïƒ) = fun x -> to_str(Ïƒ(x)) == Ïƒ |> to_str
y(map_to_str): Int -> String
y(map_to_str) == map_to_str(fun x -> x) == fun x -> to_str(x)

newtype Equiv a = Equiv { getEquiv :: a -> a -> Bool }
contramap<Equiv>: (X -> Y) -> (Equiv Y) -> (Equiv X)
contramap(Ïƒ) = fun e -> Equiv (fun x y -> getEquiv e (Ïƒ x) (Ïƒ y))

HInt: (X -> Y) -> (Int -> X) -> (Int -> Y)
HInt(f) = fun Ïƒ -> Ïƒ |> f

to_str: Bool -> String
g(b) = if b { "T" } else { "F" }

is_large: Int -> Bool
h x = x > 100

HInt to_str :: (Int -> Bool) -> (Int -> String)

HInt to_str is_large x
== (fun Ïƒ -> Ïƒ |> to_str) is_large x
== (is_large |> to_str) x
== to_str (x > 100)
== if x > 100 {"T"} else { "F" }

head<T> : List<T>  -> Option<T>
head(l) = if l.size() > 0 { Some(l[0]) } else { None }

fmap<F> : (X -> Y) -> (F X -> F Y) 

to_str : Int -> String

fmap<List> to_str |> head<String> :: List<Int> -> Option<String>

(fmap<List> to_str |> head<String>) [1, 2]
== head<Int> (["1", "2"])
== Some("1")

head<Int> | fmap<Option> to_str :: List<Int> -> Option<String>

(head<Int> | fmap<Option> to_str) [1, 2]
== (fmap<Option> to_str)(Some(1))
== Some("1")
